title: Beware The Hype Of Modern Tech - IT Jungle
content: Beware The Hype Of Modern Tech  IT Jungle
description: Many IBM i shops are under the gun to modernize their applications as part of a digital transformation initiative. If the app is more than 10 or 15 years old and doesn’t use the latest technology and techniques, it’s considered a legacy system that must be torn down and rebuilt according to current code. But
